document_data.name: Fire of Justice
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fire of justice''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that ignited a [[magic]]al fire within the body of any creature struck by the caster. It was used by [[cleric]]s of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] god of justice, [[Tyr]].
document_data.Effects: When in battle, a cleric could cast ''fire of justice'' at any person or creature they had previously harmed. When cast, it produced a fire-like energy within the target's body that "burned" them from the inside out. It was particularly damaging to the [[undead]].
document_data.History: This spell appeared on one of the [[scroll]]s that was stored within the ''[[Balance of Belaros]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a piece of coal that had been previously been set alight and a drop of [[holy water]] that had been consecrated by a [[church of Tyr|Tyrran]] cleric.
